Literature.Title: Synthesis and structure-activity relationships of antibacterial phosphonopeptides incorporating (1-aminoethyl)phosphonic acid and (aminomethyl)phosphonic acid
Literature.Author: Atherton FR, Hassall CH, Lambert RW

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli NCIB 8879(MIC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterobacter sp.(MIC=>128µg/ml),Serratia marcescens ATCC 14756(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=>128µg/ml),Haemophilus influenzae NCTC 4560(MIC=>128µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NCIB 8625(MIC=>128µg/ml)
